---
title: "Analisis exploratorio - tiempos de llegada"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(cmdstanr)
```

```{r}
remesas <- read_delim("../datos/REMESAS0100012200.txt", delim = "|", skip = 1) %>%
  mutate(timestamp = ymd_hms(paste(ANIO, MES, DIA, HORA, MINUTOS, SEGUNDOS, sep = "-")))
```

```{r}
votos <- remesas %>% select(timestamp, MORENA, PAN, PRI) %>% 
  pivot_longer(MORENA:PRI, names_to = "coalición", values_to = "num_votos")
ggplot(votos, aes(x = timestamp, y = num_votos, colour = coalición)) + 
  geom_point(alpha = 0.1) +
  geom_smooth() 
```
